ayas.translation: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of the Dawn

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.

ayas.translation: From the mischief of created things;
From the mischief of Darkness as it overspreads;
ayas.transliteration: wa min sharri ghāsiqin idhā waqab

ayas.translation: From the mischief of those who practise secret arts;
And from the mischief of the envious one as he practises envy.
ayas.transliteration: wa min sharri ḥāsidin idhā ḥasad
